item.title: Video Editing Specialist Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
We’re looking for a passionate, motivated, and intuitive video editor, specializing in Facebook and Instagram Short Form, to join our growing creative team. This role is responsible for editing the team’s Facebook and Instagram videos. This includes the editing and graphics that go into our video productions.

Balancing strategy and creativity are what you do best. You understand the best practices of pacing, structure, music, and graphic needs to produce top tier Facebook and Instagram content week after week. You’ve done this before at a high level and are able to show the trackable progress you made on previous channels you’ve worked on.

Responsibilities:

- Editing 5 Facebook and Instagram videos Ads per week
- Contribute to Pre-packaging (title and thumbnail concepts) for your videos
- Track performance and review retention data of your edits
- Pay close attention to comments on Facebook and Instagram

Results:

- You will maintain a 5 video buffer for the team's content (stay 5 videos ahead of uploads at all time)
- Improve Link Click Through Rate by 0.5% Channel wide on ads
- Consistently maintain over 7:00 AVD for both channels

Requirements:

- Deep understanding of the Facebook and Instagram Advertising space – Hooks, storytelling, pacing, and strategy
- Versatility with multiple video formats (talking head, vlog)
- Strong motion graphics background
- Experience with sound design and leveling
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Proven success on Facebook and Instagram as the editor for a growing channel
- Speed and clarity in communication (primarily in Slack)
- Willing to work in a fast-paced environment with an openness to change
- 4+ years of relevant experience in Facebook and Instagram video production

Location:

- Remote

Salary:

$10 / hour to $15 / hour

CORE VALUES:

Our core values are the heart and soul of this incredible company. The right person for this role will appreciate each of these values, personally subscribe to them, and understand why each is critical to having a great business.

Core values:

1. Humility
2. Truly Listening
3. Accountability
4. Customer Focus
5. Innovation
6. Team Building
7. Speed is King

item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to help us create multiple video ads. The ideal candidate should have experience in making video ads, especially for platforms like Facebook and YouTube.

Project Details:

We have 4 groups of ads.
Groups 1, 2, and 3 each have multiple hooks but share the same main part (body).
For example, Group 1 has 8 hooks, resulting in 8 different videos with different openings (hooks) but the same main content (body). The same applies to Groups 2 and 3.

Responsibilities:

Edit raw video footage into engaging video ads.
Add graphics, animations, and special effects.
Ensure the final videos fit our brand and marketing goals.
Manage multiple versions of videos and keep them consistent.

Requirements:

Experience in video editing, especially for ads.
Strong portfolio showing previous video ad work.
Great attention to detail and creativity.
Ability to meet deadlines.
Experience handling multiple video versions.

Preferred:

Knowledge of direct response marketing and lead funnels.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in video advertising.
If you are passionate about video editing and can create standout video ads, we'd love to hear from you!

Application Questions:

What is your experience with direct response marketing and lead funnels?
